<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wonder Worker](/Feats.aspx?ID=3735) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 47</row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), Legendary in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), Legendary in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or Legendary in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)

</column>

---

The thaumaturge's path culminates with the working of wonders. Once per day, you can align your esoterica to cast a spell of 8th level or lower that takes 1, 2, or 3 actions to cast. The spell must be common or one to which you have access. You can choose a spell of any tradition for which you're legendary in the associated skill (Arcana for [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), Nature for [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4), Occultism for [occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), or Religion for [divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2)). Use your thaumaturge class DC in place of any necessary spell DC and your thaumaturge class DC – 10 in place of any necessary [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) modifier or spell attack modifier.
